episodes.title: Clawdbot Is Now Moltbot
episodes.summary: Meta 財報佳，市場看好 AI 投資。Microsoft 財報差，Azure 雲端成長放緩。Tesla 全面轉向機器人和 AI。Dow 化學公司 AI 裁員。Waymo 自駕車事故調查。Moltbot 安全疑慮。
episodes.content: Welcome to the Techbury Red Humb for Thursday, January 29th, 2026. I'm Brian McCullough...

companies.name: Meta
companies.note: 財報佳，AI CapEx 將達 $1150-1350 億

companies.name: Microsoft
companies.note: 股價跌 12%，Azure 雲端成長放緩至 39%

companies.name: Tesla
companies.note: 停產 Model S/X，轉型 Optimus 機器人工廠

companies.name: NVIDIA
companies.note: GPU 需求持續，Acre AI 用 B300 訓練模型

companies.name: SK Hynix
companies.note: 首次超越 Samsung，年營業利潤 $330 億

companies.name: Samsung
companies.note: 記憶體晶片，年營業利潤 $305 億

companies.name: xAI
companies.note: Musk AI 公司，Tesla 和 SpaceX 各投資 $20 億

companies.name: SpaceX
companies.note: 投資 xAI $20 億

companies.name: Dow
companies.note: AI 裁員 4,500 人，Transform to Outperform 計畫

companies.name: Waymo
companies.note: 自駕車撞到兒童事故，NHTSA 調查中

companies.name: BYD
companies.note: 中國低價電動車競爭對手

companies.name: Google
companies.note: AI agent 電商平台

companies.name: OpenAI
companies.note: Microsoft 雲端合約 45%，AI agent 平台

companies.name: Anthropic
companies.note: AI 模型公司

companies.name: Acre AI
companies.note: 美國新創，發布 400B 參數 Trinity 模型

companies.name: Uber
companies.note: AI agent 電商合作夥伴

companies.name: Stripe
companies.note: AI agent 電商合作夥伴

companies.name: Rubrik
companies.note: 贊助商，AI Agent Cloud 平台

companies.name: PLAUD
companies.note: 贊助商，AI 筆記設備

companies.name: Hudson Rock
companies.note: 資安公司，發現 Moltbot 安全漏洞
